name: GLKEffectPropertyTransform
desc: Coordinate transform information for use in GLKit rendering effects.

items.name: var modelviewMatrix: GLKMatrix4
items.desc: The matrix used to transform position coordinates from world space to eye space.

items.name: var normalMatrix: GLKMatrix3
items.desc: The matrix used to transform normal coordinates from world space to eye space.

items.name: var projectionMatrix: GLKMatrix4
items.desc: The matrix used to transform position coordinates from eye space to projection space.
